options.content:
# SPACE Framework - Developer Productivity Metrics

The SPACE framework captures five key dimensions of developer productivity: **S**atisfaction, **P**erformance, **A**ctivity, **C**ommunication & Collaboration, and **E**fficiency & Flow.

*Based on research by GitHub, Microsoft, and University of Victoria*

## S - Satisfaction & Well-being
*How fulfilled developers feel with their work, team, tools, and culture*

panels.description: Developer workload distribution - commits per engineer to identify potential burnout

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  c.author_name as metric,
  COUNT(DISTINCT c.sha) as value
FROM commits c
JOIN repo_commits rc ON c.sha = rc.commit_sha
JOIN project_mapping pm ON rc.repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(c.authored_date)
  AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merge %' AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merged %'
  AND c.author_name IS NOT NULL AND c.author_name != ''
GROUP BY c.author_name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT c.sha) > 0
ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT c.sha) DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Workload Distribution (Commits)

panels.description: Work-life balance indicator - activity outside business hours

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN HOUR(c.authored_date) < 9 OR HOUR(c.authored_date) >= 18 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1) as value
FROM commits c
JOIN repo_commits rc ON c.sha = rc.commit_sha
JOIN project_mapping pm ON rc.repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(c.authored_date)
  AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merge %' AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merged %'

panels.title: After-Hours Work %

panels.description: Active coding days per engineer - higher is generally better for engagement

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  c.author_name as 'Engineer',
  COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(c.authored_date)) as 'Coding Days',
  COUNT(DISTINCT c.sha) as 'Total Commits'
FROM commits c
JOIN repo_commits rc ON c.sha = rc.commit_sha
JOIN project_mapping pm ON rc.repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(c.authored_date)
  AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merge %' AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merged %'
  AND c.author_name IS NOT NULL AND c.author_name != ''
GROUP BY c.author_name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(c.authored_date)) > 0
ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(c.authored_date)) DESC
LIMIT 15

panels.title: Engineer Engagement (Coding Days)

options.content:
## P - Performance
*Outcomes over output - code reliability, task completion, and quality*

panels.description: Bug fix rate - percentage of resolved bugs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN i.status = 'DONE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1) as value
FROM issues i
WHERE i.type = 'BUG'
  AND $__timeFilter(i.created_date)

panels.title: Bug Resolution Rate

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN p.result = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1) as value
FROM cicd_pipelines p
WHERE p.result IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(p.created_date)

SELECT 
  ROUND(100.0 - (100.0 * COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN cq.severity IN ('BLOCKER', 'CRITICAL') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 1)), 1) as value
FROM cq_issues cq
WHERE cq.created_date IS NOT NULL

SELECT 
  COALESCE(SUM(i.story_point), 0) as value
FROM issues i
WHERE i.status = 'DONE'
  AND $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)

SELECT 
  i.assignee_name as 'Engineer',
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN i.status = 'DONE' THEN i.id END) as 'Issues Resolved',
  COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN i.status = 'DONE' THEN i.story_point ELSE 0 END), 0) as 'Story Points',
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN i.type = 'BUG' AND i.status = 'DONE' THEN i.id END) as 'Bugs Fixed',
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN i.type = 'BUG' THEN i.id END) as 'Bugs Assigned',
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN i.type = 'BUG' AND i.status = 'DONE' THEN i.id END) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN i.type = 'BUG' THEN i.id END), 0), 1) as 'Bug Fix Rate %',
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN i.status = 'DONE' THEN i.lead_time_minutes END) / 1440, 1) as 'Avg Lead Time (Days)'
FROM issues i
JOIN board_issues bi ON i.id = bi.issue_id
JOIN boards b ON bi.board_id = b.id
JOIN project_mapping pm ON b.id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
  AND i.assignee_name IS NOT NULL AND i.assignee_name != ''
GROUP BY i.assignee_name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN i.status = 'DONE' THEN i.id END) > 0
ORDER BY COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN i.status = 'DONE' THEN i.story_point ELSE 0 END), 0) DESC
LIMIT 20

options.content:
## A - Activity
*Tracking development activities - coding, testing, debugging, and collaboration*

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE(c.authored_date) as time,
  COUNT(DISTINCT c.sha) as value
FROM commits c
JOIN repo_commits rc ON c.sha = rc.commit_sha
JOIN project_mapping pm ON rc.repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(c.authored_date)
  AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merge %' AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merged %'
GROUP BY DATE(c.authored_date)
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  DATE(pr.created_date) as time,
  'Opened' as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM pull_requests pr
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
GROUP BY DATE(pr.created_date)
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  DATE(pr.merged_date) as time,
  'Merged' as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM pull_requests pr
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND pr.status = 'MERGED'
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
GROUP BY DATE(pr.merged_date)
ORDER BY time

WITH 
_commits AS (
  SELECT author_name, 
         COUNT(DISTINCT sha) as commits,
         COALESCE(SUM(additions), 0) as lines_added,
         COALESCE(SUM(deletions), 0) as lines_deleted
  FROM commits c
  JOIN repo_commits rc ON c.sha = rc.commit_sha
  JOIN project_mapping pm ON rc.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.`table` = 'repos'
  WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project}) AND $__timeFilter(c.authored_date)
    AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merge %' AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merged %'
  GROUP BY author_name
),
_prs AS (
  SELECT author_name, 
         COUNT(*) as prs_opened,
         SUM(CASE WHEN pr.status = 'MERGED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as prs_merged
  FROM pull_requests pr
  JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.`table` = 'repos'
  WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project}) AND $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
  GROUP BY author_name
),
_reviews AS (
  SELECT prr.user_name as author_name,
         COUNT(DISTINCT pull_request_id) as prs_reviewed,
         COUNT(*) as review_comments
  FROM pull_request_reviewers prr
  JOIN pull_requests pr ON prr.pull_request_id = pr.id
  JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.`table` = 'repos'
  WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project}) AND $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    AND prr.user_name IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY prr.user_name
),
_issues AS (
  SELECT assignee_name as author_name,
         COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN status = 'DONE' THEN i.id END) as issues_resolved
  FROM issues i
  JOIN board_issues bi ON i.id = bi.issue_id
  JOIN boards b ON bi.board_id = b.id
  JOIN project_mapping pm ON b.id = pm.row_id AND pm.`table` = 'boards'
  WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project}) AND $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
  GROUP BY assignee_name
),
all_authors AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM _commits WHERE author_name IS NOT NULL AND author_name != ''
  UNION
  SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM _prs WHERE author_name IS NOT NULL AND author_name != ''
  UNION
  SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM _reviews WHERE author_name IS NOT NULL AND author_name != ''
  UNION
  SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM _issues WHERE author_name IS NOT NULL AND author_name != ''
)
SELECT 
  a.author_name as 'Engineer',
  COALESCE(c.commits, 0) as 'Commits',
  COALESCE(c.lines_added, 0) as 'Lines Added',
  COALESCE(c.lines_deleted, 0) as 'Lines Deleted',
  COALESCE(p.prs_opened, 0) as 'PRs Opened',
  COALESCE(p.prs_merged, 0) as 'PRs Merged',
  COALESCE(r.prs_reviewed, 0) as 'PRs Reviewed',
  COALESCE(r.review_comments, 0) as 'Review Comments',
  COALESCE(i.issues_resolved, 0) as 'Issues Resolved'
FROM all_authors a
LEFT JOIN _commits c ON a.author_name = c.author_name
LEFT JOIN _prs p ON a.author_name = p.author_name
LEFT JOIN _reviews r ON a.author_name = r.author_name
LEFT JOIN _issues i ON a.author_name = i.author_name
WHERE COALESCE(c.commits, 0) > 0 OR COALESCE(p.prs_opened, 0) > 0 OR COALESCE(r.prs_reviewed, 0) > 0 OR COALESCE(i.issues_resolved, 0) > 0
ORDER BY COALESCE(c.commits, 0) DESC
LIMIT 30

options.content:
## C - Communication & Collaboration
*Team collaboration, code reviews, documentation, and knowledge sharing*

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN prc.id IS NOT NULL THEN pr.id END) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT pr.id), 0), 1) as value
FROM pull_requests pr
LEFT JOIN pull_request_comments prc ON pr.id = prc.pull_request_id
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)

SELECT 
  ROUND(COUNT(prc.id) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT pr.id), 0), 1) as value
FROM pull_requests pr
LEFT JOIN pull_request_comments prc ON pr.id = prc.pull_request_id
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)

SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT prr.user_name) as value
FROM pull_request_reviewers prr
JOIN pull_requests pr ON prr.pull_request_id = pr.id
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
  AND prr.user_name IS NOT NULL

SELECT 
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pri.issue_id IS NOT NULL THEN pr.id END) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT pr.id), 0), 1) as value
FROM pull_requests pr
LEFT JOIN pull_request_issues pri ON pr.id = pri.pull_request_id
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)

panels.description: Top code reviewers and their contribution

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  COALESCE(prr.name, prr.user_name) as 'Reviewer',
  COUNT(DISTINCT prr.pull_request_id) as 'PRs Reviewed',
  COUNT(*) as 'Comments Given',
  ROUND(COUNT(*) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT prr.pull_request_id), 0), 1) as 'Avg Comments/PR',
  COUNT(DISTINCT pr.author_name) as 'Authors Helped'
FROM pull_request_reviewers prr
JOIN pull_requests pr ON prr.pull_request_id = pr.id
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
  AND prr.user_name IS NOT NULL AND prr.user_name != ''
GROUP BY COALESCE(prr.name, prr.user_name)
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT prr.pull_request_id) > 0
ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT prr.pull_request_id) DESC
LIMIT 15

panels.title: Code Review Leaders

panels.description: Collaboration network - who reviews whose code

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  COALESCE(ga_author.name, pr.author_name) as 'PR Author',
  COALESCE(prr.name, prr.user_name) as 'Reviewer',
  COUNT(*) as 'Interactions',
  COUNT(DISTINCT pr.id) as 'PRs'
FROM pull_request_reviewers prr
JOIN pull_requests pr ON prr.pull_request_id = pr.id
LEFT JOIN _tool_gitlab_accounts ga_author ON CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(pr.author_id, '[0-9]+$') AS UNSIGNED) = ga_author.gitlab_id
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
  AND prr.user_name IS NOT NULL AND prr.user_name != ''
  AND pr.author_name IS NOT NULL AND pr.author_name != ''
  AND pr.author_name != prr.user_name
GROUP BY COALESCE(ga_author.name, pr.author_name), COALESCE(prr.name, prr.user_name)
HAVING COUNT(*) > 0
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 20

panels.title: Collaboration Network

options.content:
## E - Efficiency & Flow
*Time in flow state, cycle times, and process efficiency*

panels.description: Average PR cycle time (creation to merge)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  ROUND(AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, pr.created_date, pr.merged_date)), 1) as value
FROM pull_requests pr
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND pr.status = 'MERGED'
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)

panels.title: Avg PR Cycle Time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  ROUND(AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, pr.created_date, first_comment.created_date)), 1) as value
FROM pull_requests pr
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT pull_request_id, MIN(created_date) as created_date
  FROM pull_request_comments
  GROUP BY pull_request_id
) first_comment ON pr.id = first_comment.pull_request_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
  AND first_comment.created_date IS NOT NULL

SELECT 
  ROUND(AVG(i.lead_time_minutes) / 1440, 1) as value
FROM issues i
JOIN board_issues bi ON i.id = bi.issue_id
JOIN boards b ON bi.board_id = b.id
JOIN project_mapping pm ON b.id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND i.status = 'DONE'
  AND $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)

SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM cicd_pipelines p
JOIN project_mapping pm ON p.cicd_scope_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND p.type = 'DEPLOYMENT'
  AND p.result = 'SUCCESS'
  AND $__timeFilter(p.finished_date)

panels.description: PR cycle time trend over time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE(pr.merged_date) as time,
  ROUND(AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, pr.created_date, pr.merged_date)), 1) as value
FROM pull_requests pr
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND pr.status = 'MERGED'
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
GROUP BY DATE(pr.merged_date)
ORDER BY time

panels.title: PR Cycle Time Trend

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE(p.finished_date) as time,
  ROUND(AVG(p.duration_sec) / 60, 1) as value
FROM cicd_pipelines p
JOIN project_mapping pm ON p.cicd_scope_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND p.result = 'SUCCESS'
  AND $__timeFilter(p.finished_date)
GROUP BY DATE(p.finished_date)
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  COALESCE(ga.name, pr.author_name) as 'Engineer',
  COUNT(DISTINCT pr.id) as 'PRs Merged',
  ROUND(AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, pr.created_date, pr.merged_date)), 1) as 'Avg PR Cycle (hrs)',
  ROUND(MIN(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, pr.created_date, pr.merged_date)), 1) as 'Min PR Cycle (hrs)',
  ROUND(MAX(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, pr.created_date, pr.merged_date)), 1) as 'Max PR Cycle (hrs)',
  COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(pr.merged_date)) as 'Active Days',
  ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT pr.id) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(pr.merged_date)), 0), 1) as 'PRs/Day'
FROM pull_requests pr
LEFT JOIN _tool_gitlab_accounts ga ON 
  CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(pr.author_id, '[0-9]+$') AS UNSIGNED) = ga.gitlab_id
JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id
WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project})
  AND pr.status = 'MERGED'
  AND $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
  AND pr.author_name IS NOT NULL AND pr.author_name != ''
GROUP BY COALESCE(ga.name, pr.author_name)
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT pr.id) >= 3
ORDER BY AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, pr.created_date, pr.merged_date))
LIMIT 25

options.content:
## SPACE Framework Summary
*Holistic view across all five dimensions*

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
_activity AS (
  SELECT author_name, 
         COUNT(DISTINCT sha) as commits,
         COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(authored_date)) as coding_days
  FROM commits c
  JOIN repo_commits rc ON c.sha = rc.commit_sha
  JOIN project_mapping pm ON rc.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.`table` = 'repos'
  WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project}) AND $__timeFilter(c.authored_date)
    AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merge %' AND c.message NOT LIKE 'Merged %'
  GROUP BY author_name
),
_collaboration AS (
  SELECT prr.user_name as author_name,
         COUNT(DISTINCT pull_request_id) as prs_reviewed,
         COUNT(*) as review_comments
  FROM pull_request_reviewers prr
  JOIN pull_requests pr ON prr.pull_request_id = pr.id
  JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.`table` = 'repos'
  WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project}) AND $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    AND prr.user_name IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY prr.user_name
),
_efficiency AS (
  SELECT author_name,
         COUNT(DISTINCT pr.id) as prs_merged,
         ROUND(AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, pr.created_date, pr.merged_date)), 1) as avg_pr_cycle_hrs
  FROM pull_requests pr
  JOIN project_mapping pm ON pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.`table` = 'repos'
  WHERE pm.project_name IN (${project}) 
    AND pr.status = 'MERGED'
    AND $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
  GROUP BY author_name
),
all_authors AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM _activity WHERE author_name IS NOT NULL AND author_name != ''
  UNION
  SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM _collaboration WHERE author_name IS NOT NULL AND author_name != ''
  UNION
  SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM _efficiency WHERE author_name IS NOT NULL AND author_name != ''
)
SELECT 
  a.author_name as 'Engineer',
  COALESCE(act.commits, 0) as 'Commits (A)',
  COALESCE(act.coding_days, 0) as 'Coding Days (S)',
  COALESCE(c.prs_reviewed, 0) as 'PRs Reviewed (C)',
  COALESCE(c.review_comments, 0) as 'Review Comments (C)',
  COALESCE(e.prs_merged, 0) as 'PRs Merged (E)',
  COALESCE(e.avg_pr_cycle_hrs, 0) as 'Avg PR Cycle hrs (E)'
FROM all_authors a
LEFT JOIN _activity act ON a.author_name = act.author_name
LEFT JOIN _collaboration c ON a.author_name = c.author_name
LEFT JOIN _efficiency e ON a.author_name = e.author_name
WHERE COALESCE(act.commits, 0) > 0 OR COALESCE(c.prs_reviewed, 0) > 0 OR COALESCE(e.prs_merged, 0) > 0
ORDER BY COALESCE(act.commits, 0) DESC
LIMIT 30

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT project_name FROM project_mapping ORDER BY project_name
list.label: Project
list.name: project
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT project_name FROM project_mapping ORDER BY project_name
